/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, adding a touch of industrial charm to the otherwise serene landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
